mapper.select: SELECT m.YMD as menuYmd , f.FOOD_NM as menuNm, i.INGREDIENTS_NM as ingredientsNm , c2.code_nm as mealNm FROM CMS_FOOD f,CMS_MENU m, CMS_COMMON_CODE c1, CMS_COMMON_CODE c2, CMS_INGREDIENTS i, CMS_RECIPE r WHERE m.FOOD_ID = f.FOOD_ID AND m.RESTAURANT_ID = c1.CODE_ID AND m.MEAL_ID = c2.CODE_ID AND r.INGREDIENTS_ID = i.INGREDIENTS_ID AND m.food_id = r.food_id AND TO_CHAR(m.YMD,'YYMMDD') BETWEEN 220103 AND 220107 AND c1.CODE_NM= '여민관' ORDER BY YMD,c2.CODE_ID
